metadata.name: Suspicious GPO Discovery With Get-GPO
metadata.comment: Detect use of Get-GPO to get one GPO or all the GPOs in a domain.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-gpo')))

output.summary: Detect use of Get-GPO to get one GPO or all the GPOs in a domain.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate PowerShell scripts References: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1615/T1615.md, https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/powershell/module/grouppolicy/get-gpo?view=windowsserver2022-ps
